comment: Prof. Eichler is sweet, BUT if you care about actually learning the material in the class, do not take her. Her lectures do not relate to the class at all, and you will have to learn material yourself through a textbook. Her grading scale &  project instructions didn't make sense and she often changed details on the spot. Do not recommend.

She clearly doesn't know how to use Adobe programs so prepare to teach yourself everything. She barely explains projects and constantly contradicts herself on directions and due dates. She also doesn't follow the syllabus at all. Her lectures make no sense and usually have nothing to do with the projects. She's nice but can not teach at all.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: While she has a lot of great connections in the graphic design world, trying to learn anything from her class is difficult. Shes either late to class by 30+ minutes or not present without explanation. Her feedback on projects was always contradictory before and after turn in. Her grading is tough & makes 0 sense. Too bad shes the only option.
